divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in my house playing World of warcraft when suddenly I saw my window glowing in to my room so i opened my curtains and saw the giant triangle, it was about 8 balls of light forming a triangle, At first I thought it was a Military operation because the President is going to Ireland on Monday but it just stayed there so I knew it was a UFO. It just hovered over buildings. i felt a sudden rush of excitement and adrenaline, which i had not felt since i was in College doing ecstacy.
